description: Order of cyclic group of diffeomorphism classes of exotic (4n-1)-spheres which bound parallelizable manifolds, for n >= 2.
references: J. W. Milnor and J. D. Stasheff, Characteristic Classes, Princeton, 1974, p. 285.
links: Index entries for sequences related to Bernoulli numbers.
John W. Milnor, Differential Topology Forty-six Years Later, Notices Amer. Math. Soc. 58 (2011), 804-809.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
